displayName.german: Erster Tag bei der neuen Arbeitsstelle

description.english: Complete your first mission
description.french: Terminez votre premier quart
description.italian: Completa il tuo primo turno
description.japanese: 初めてのシフトをクリア
description.spanish: Completa tu primer turno.

description.english: Complete the first Canteen mission
description.french: Terminez le premier quart en cantine
description.italian: Completa il primo turno in mensa
description.japanese: 初めての食堂シフトをクリア
description.spanish: Completa el primer turno de cafetería.

description.english: Complete the first Packing mission
description.french: Terminez le premier quart en emballage

description.japanese: 初めてのパッキング シフトをクリア
description.russian: Отработайте первую смену в отделе упаковки
description.spanish: Completa el primer turno de empaquetado.

description.english: Complete all Challenges
description.french: Terminez tous les défis
description.italian: Completa tutte le sfide
description.japanese: 全てのチャレンジをクリア
description.spanish: Completa todos los desafíos.

description.english: Unlock all Pistols
description.french: Déverrouillez tous les pistolets
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le pistole
description.japanese: 全てのピストルをアンロック
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las pistolas

description.english: Unlock all Revolvers
description.french: Déverrouillez tous les revolvers
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i revolver
description.japanese: 全てのリボルバーをアンロック
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los revólveres.

displayName.italian: Questo è il mio bastone del tuono!
displayName.japanese: これぞ我がショットガン！

description.english: Unlock all Shotguns
description.french: Déverrouillez tous les fusils de chasse

description.french: Déverrouillez toutes les mitrailleuses
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le mitragliette

description.english: Unlock all Assault Rifles
description.french: Déverrouillez tous les fusils d'assaut
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i fucili d'assalto
description.japanese: 全てのアサルトライフルをアンロック
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los fusiles

description.english: Unlock all Explosives
description.french: Déverrouillez tous les explosifs
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli esplosivi
description.japanese: 全ての爆発物をアンロック
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los explosivos.

description.english: Kill 500 Fruit with Pistols
description.french: Tuez 500 fruits au pistolet
description.italian: Uccidi 500 frutti con le pistole
description.japanese: ピストルでフルーツを500個撃破
description.spanish: Mata a 500 frutas con pistolas.

description.french: Tuez 500 fruits au revolver
description.italian: Uccidi 500 frutti con i revolver
description.japanese: リボルバーでフルーツを500個撃破
description.spanish: Mata a 500 frutas con revólveres.

description.english: Kill 500 Fruit with Shotguns
description.french: Tuez 500 fruits au fusil de chasse
description.italian: Uccidi 500 frutti con i fucili a pompa
description.japanese: ショットガンでフルーツを500個撃破
description.spanish: Mata a 500 frutas con escopetas.

description.english: Kill 500 Fruit with Submachine Guns
description.french: Tuez 500 fruits à la mitraillette
description.italian: Uccidi 500 frutti con le mitragliette
description.japanese: サブマシンガンでフルーツを500個撃破
description.spanish: Mata a 500 frutas con metralletas.

displayName.japanese: アサルトライフルの達人

description.english: Kill 500 Fruit with Assault Rifles
description.french: Tuez 500 fruits au fusil d'assaut
description.italian: Uccidi 500 frutti con i fucili d'assalto
description.japanese: アサルトライフルでフルーツを500個撃破
description.spanish: Mata a 500 frutas con fusiles de asalto.

description.english: Kill 500 Fruit with Explosives
description.french: Tuez 500 fruits à l'explosif
description.italian: Uccidi 500 frutti con gli esplosivi
description.japanese: 爆発物でフルーツを500個撃破

description.english: Purchase all Weapons
description.french: Acheter tous les fusils
description.italian: Acquista tutte le armi
description.japanese: 全ての銃を買う
description.spanish: Compra todas las armas.

displayName.japanese: 無駄にするな、欲張るな

description.english: Kill multiple fruit with a single shotgun blast 10 times
description.french: Tuez des fruits en vidant entièrement un fusil de chasse
description.german: Erledige mit jedem Schuss eines Schrotflintenmagazins Obst
description.italian: Uccidi frutti con ogni cartuccia nel caricatore del fucile a pompa
description.japanese: 1発のショットガンで複数フルーツ撃破を10回
description.russian: Убейте по фрукту каждым патроном в обойме дробовика
description.spanish: Mata a una fruta con todos los cartuchos de la escopeta.

description.english: Kill fruit with every shell in the magazine of a Shotgun
description.french: Tuez plusieurs fruits en un seul tir de fusil de chasse 10 fois
description.german: Erledige 10 Mal mit einem einzelnen Schrotflintenschuss mehrere Stücke Obst
description.italian: Uccidi frutti multipli con un singolo colpo di fucile a pompa 10 volte
description.japanese: 1発のショットガンで複数フルーツ撃破を10回
description.russian: Убейте несколько фруктов одним выстрелом из дробовика 10 раз
description.spanish: Mata 10 veces a varias frutas de un solo escopetazo.

description.english: Kill fruit by shooting a grenade
description.french: Tuez des fruits en lançant une grenade
description.german: Erledige das Obst mit einer Granate
description.italian: Uccidi un frutto lanciando una granata
description.japanese: グレネードでフルーツを撃破
description.spanish: Mata frutas disparando a una granada.

description.english: Attach C4 to a fruit and detonate it
description.french: Fixez du C4 sur un fruit et faites-le exploser
description.german: Befestige C4 an einem Stück Obst und jage es in die Luft
description.italian: Attacca del C4 a un frutto e fallo esplodere
description.japanese: フルーツにC4をくっつけて爆破
description.russian: Прикрепите взрывчатку C4 к фрукту и подорвите ее
description.spanish: Ponle C4 a una fruta y hazla detonar.

description.english: Get 100% accuracy with a full Pistol magazine 10 times in a shift
description.french: Obtenez 100 % de précision avec un chargeur de pistolet plein 10 fois dans un quart
description.german: Erreiche 10 Mal in einer Schicht 100 % Genauigkeit mit einem vollen Pistolenmagazin
description.italian: Ottieni il 100% della precisione con un caricatore di pistola completo per 10 volte in un solo turno
description.japanese: 1回のシフトで、ピストルの弾倉全10発で100%の精度を達成
description.russian: Добейтесь 100%-й точности при отстреливании полной обоймы пистолета 10 раз за смену
description.spanish: Consigue una precisión del 100% con un solo cargador 10 veces en un turno.

description.english: Get 5 kills with any automatic weapon without letting go of the trigger
description.french: Faites 5 frags avec n'importe quelle arme automatique sans relâcher la gâchette
description.german: Hol dir 5 Kills mit einer Automatikwaffe, ohne den Abzug loszulassen
description.italian: Ottieni 5 uccisioni con qualsiasi arma automatica senza mai lasciare il grilletto
description.japanese: 自動武器のトリガーから手を離さずに5キル達成
description.russian: Убейте 5 целей из любого автоматического оружия, не отпуская спусковой крючок
description.spanish: Consigue 5 muertes con armas automáticas sin soltar el gatillo.

description.english: Get 10 kills with a single magazine of a Submachine Gun
description.french: Faites 10 frags avec un seul chargeur de mitraillette
description.german: Hol dir 10 Kills mit einem Maschinenpistolenmagazin
description.italian: Ottieni 10 uccisioni con un solo caricatore di mitraglietta
description.japanese: サブマシンガンの弾倉1つで10キル達成
description.russian: Убейте 10 целей одной обоймой из пистолета-пулемета
description.spanish: Consigue 10 muertes con un cargador de la metralleta.

displayName.japanese: アサルトライフルの達人

description.english: Earn 7000 juice with Assault Rifles in a shift
description.french: Gagnez 7.000 gouttes de jus au fusil d'assaut en un quart
description.german: Erhalte 7000 Saft in einer Schicht mit Sturmgewehren
description.italian: Ottieni 7.000 unità di succo con i fucili d'assalto in un singolo turno
description.japanese: 1回のシフトで、アサルトライフルを使って7,000ジュース獲得
description.russian: Соберите 7000 сока за смену с помощью автоматов
description.spanish: Consigue 7000 de zumo con fusiles en un turno.

displayName.italian: Ottieni 25 uccisioni con ogni mano in una singola missione

description.english: Get 25 kills with each hand in a mission
description.french: Faites 25 frags avec chaque main en mission
description.german: Hol dir 25 Kills in einer Mission mit jeder Hand
description.italian: Ottieni 25 uccisioni con ogni mano in una singola missione
description.japanese: 1回のミッションで、それぞれの手で25キル達成
description.russian: Убейте по 25 целей с каждой руки в задании
description.spanish: Consigue 25 muertes con cada mano en una misión.

description.english: Complete 15 Canteen trays in a row
description.french: Terminez 15 plateaux de cantine d'affilée
description.italian: Completa 15 vassoi della mensa di fila
description.japanese: 食堂のトレイを15個連続で正しく処理する
description.spanish: Completa 15 bandejas seguidas de la cafetería.

description.english: Correctly place 5 food packets in one tray section
description.french: Placez correctement 5 paquets de nourriture sur une partie plateau
description.german: Lege 5 richtige Essenspakete in ein Tablettfach
description.italian: Posiziona correttamente 5 pacchetti di cibo in una sezione di vassoio
description.japanese: 1つのトレイエリアに5個のフードパケットを正しく置く
description.russian: Правильно поместите 5 пакетов с едой в один отсек
description.spanish: Coloca correctamente 5 paquetes de comida en una bandeja.

displayName.japanese: トータル・フルータニティ

description.english: Earn 1,000,000 juice (Cumulative)
description.french: Gagnez 1.000.000 de gouttes de jus (cumulées)
description.italian: Ottieni 1.000.000 di unità di succo (cumulative)
description.japanese: 1,000,000ジュース獲得（累積）
description.spanish: Consigue 1 000 000 de zumo (en total).

description.english: Kill a fruit with a thrown Cherry
description.french: Tuez un fruit en lançant une cerise
description.german: Erledige ein Stück Obst mit einer geworfenen Kirsche
description.italian: Uccidi un frutto con il lancio di una ciliegia
description.japanese: チェリーを投げてフルーツを撃破
description.spanish: Mata a una fruta lanzando una cereza.

description.english: Shoot 200 fruit projectiles out of the air
description.french: Touchez 200 projectiles fruitiers en plein air
description.italian: Colpisci al volo 200 proiettili di frutta
description.japanese: フルーツの放った弾を空中で200個撃破
description.spanish: Dispara a 200 proyectiles frutales.

description.english: Survive 30 minutes in the Checkout Marathon
description.french: Survivez 30 minutes lors du marathon de caisse
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 30 minuti alla Maratona pagamento
description.japanese: レジ打ちマラソンで30分間生き延びる
description.russian: Выживите в течение 30 минут в марафоне за кассой
description.spanish: Sobrevive durante 30 minutos en la maratón de cobro.

description.english: Survive 30 minutes in the Canteen Marathon
description.french: Survivez 30 minutes lors du marathon de caisse
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 30 minuti alla Maratona pagamento
description.japanese: 食堂マラソンで30分間生き延びろ
description.russian: Выживите в течение 30 минут в марафоне в буфете
description.spanish: Sobrevive durante 30 minutos en la maratón de cafetería.

description.english: Survive 30 minutes in the Packing Marathon
description.french: Survivez 30 minutes dans le marathon d'emballage
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 30 minuti alla Maratona imballaggio
description.japanese: パッキングマラソンで30分間生き延びろ
description.russian: Выживите в течение 30 минут в упаковочном марафоне
description.spanish: Sobrevive durante 30 minutos en la maratón de empaquetado.

description.english: Grab a fruit and shoot it out of your hand
description.french: Tirez sur un fruit en le tenant
description.german: Schnapp dir ein Stück Obst und schieß es aus deiner Hand
description.italian: Afferra un frutto e sparagli fino a farlo saltare dalla tua mano
description.japanese: フルーツを手でつかんで撃つ
description.spanish: Coge una fruta y dispárale en tu mano.

description.english: Throw a gun in the air and catch it
description.french: Lancez un pistolet en l'air et attrapez-le
description.german: Wirf eine Waffe in die Luft und fang sie
description.italian: Lancia un'arma in aria e afferrala al volo
description.japanese: 空中に銃を投げてキャッチ
description.spanish: Lanza un arma al aire y atrápala.

description.english: Kill 3 fruit with a single explosion
description.french: Tuez 3 fruits en une seule explosion
description.german: Erledige 3 Stück Obst in einer Explosion
description.italian: Uccidi 3 frutti con una sola esplosione
description.japanese: 1回の爆破でフルーツを3個撃破
description.spanish: Mata a 3 frutas con una misma explosión.
